name: Purgatoty: After Life
description:
The game is about a man that died and is possessed by both the Reaper and Archangel that are trying to help him in the AFTER LIFE to find his pace. The reaper is afraid of LIGHT and the Archangel is afraid of FIRE. Both have special abilities.

Can you find the PACE?

Controlls:

T-> Transitions   

Left click -> Attack/Heal    

 Right click -> Attack                                                  

Space-> Jump

 A,D -> Movement
